backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend canister with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: crackers burst animation, text contrast improvements, kiss graphics background pattern, and butterfly rendering fixes, all with high confidence and mapped to frontend/index.html.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary describing frontend/index.html as a complete romantic birthday microsite with animations and effects, and frontend/src/App.tsx as a placeholder directing users to the standalone HTML file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a comprehensive design system including color schemes for light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/index.html: Self-contained romantic birthday microsite HTML file with embedded styles and animations including floating particles, crackers burst effect, kiss patterns, and butterfly graphics (content truncated).
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component displaying a message that directs users to open the standalone index.html file to view the birthday microsite experience.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP backend actor creation with authentication support, automatically recreating actors when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with idle handling (content truncated).
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking for an interactive romantic birthday experience with crackers burst, kiss-filled letters, and butterfly animations. Contains four pending feature requests addressing visibility issues with letters and butterflies, plus requirements for proper contrast and rendering.
